item.source: [REQ] Anyone got/ can make a rune seller?

item.title: [REQ] Anyone got/ can make a rune seller?
item.dc:creator: @premier premier
item.description:
@premier wrote:

[scar]
{ put your runes in the first slot. )
(fill in how many you want to sell on line 16}

program New;
{.include srl\srl.scar}

const
howmanysell = 1000;

var
sold:integer;

//from srl just buysell didnt compile
{*******************************************************************************
procedure SellCoords(x, y, amount: Integer);
By: RSN
Description: Sells Item at x, y
*******************************************************************************}
procedure SellCoords(x, y, amount: Integer);
var
ix, iy : Integer;
ToSell : array[1…3] of Integer;
Done : array[1…3] of Integer;
begin
ix := x;
iy := y;
ToSell[1] := amount div 10;
ToSell[2] := (amount mod 10) div 5;
ToSell[3] := (amount mod 10) mod 5;
while (done[1] < toSell[1]) do
begin
Mouse(ix, iy, 3, 3, False);
Wait(450);
if (ClickOption(‘Sell 10’, 2)) then
Done[1] := done[1] + 1
else
Exit;
Wait(300);
end;
while (done[2] < toSell[2]) do
begin
Mouse(ix, iy, 3, 3, False);
Wait(450);
if (ClickOption(‘Sell 5’, 2)) then
Done[2] := done[2] + 1
else
Exit;
Wait(300);
end;
while (done[3] < toSell[3]) do
begin
Mouse(ix, iy, 3, 3, False);
Wait(450);
if (ClickOption(‘Sell 1’, 2)) then
Done[3] := done[3] + 1
else
Exit;
end;
end;

begin
repeat
sellcoords(584, 232,10)
wait(250+random(150))
sold := sold + 10
until(sold = howmanysell)
end.
[/scar]
if it doesnt work tell me

Read full topic
